titles.title: Songs – L.L.- hunting spirit songs; M.L. – Love Song; L.L. – song from British Columbia (answering M.L.); H.D. – a Snohomish warriors’ song; H.D. maternal grandfather’s spirit song in Clallam.

descriptions.description: Contents: Levi and Martha Lamont, Harriet Dover (Snohomish, Clallam, etc.) (8/22/63): Songs – L.L.- hunting spirit songs M.L. – Love Song L.L. – song from British Columbia (answering M.L.) H.D. – a Snohomish warriors’ song H.D. maternal grandfather’s spirit song in Clallam. From the Thom Hess Collection, Ethnomusicology Archives (UWEA 95-19.9) University of Washington, Seattle
